title: MD
biography: Kharampur Mazar Sharif is a mazar (mausoleum) in the village of Kharampur, Akhaura Upazila, Brahmanbaria District, Bangladesh. It is built on the burial ground of Syed Ahmad Gesudaraz. The structure stands on 260 acres (110 ha) of land.
aiSummary: Amer Sharif is a health systems specialist with an H-index of 7 at Dubai Health Authority (Member). Has been published in IOP Conference Series Materials Science and Engineering, The New England journal of medicine, Metallomics : integrated biometal science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
